name: Anxiety (itch) (Alex Stewart (Albin))
description:
In Anxiety, the character falls down a dark hole. Avoid pillars, while collecting rings!

Controls: WASD / Arrow Keys / Left Analog Stick to move.

This is an entry to the 2021 Global Game Jam, which was held exclusively online. Thank you to the Interactive Society of Nova Scotia for hosting this year! The link to the Global Game Jam page, along with source code, can be found here.

This is a personal story, and may not talk about the happiest of subjects. It is, however, important to talk about mental health, and to take it seriously.
